games.summary: ATLANTA -- —Giannis Antetokounmpohad 21 points and 17 rebounds and theMilwaukee Buckssnapped a three-game losing streak, holding off theAtlanta Hawks112-110 on Monday after squandering a 23-point lead in the second half. Alexander-Walker led the Hawks with 32 points, while Johnson had 28 points and 16 rebounds.
blurbs: 📋 Corey Kispert (ATL) made just his 3rd start this season. 2 pts, 1 reb.
⬆️ Pete Nance (MIL) played 15 min (season avg: 4). 5 pts, 4 reb, 2 ast.

games.summary: CLEVELAND -- —Shai Gilgeous-Alexanderscored 30 points,Chet Holmgrenadded 28 and theOklahoma City Thunderrolled to a 136-104 victory over theCleveland Cavalierson Monday. Donovan Mitchellled the Cavaliers with 19 points, whileJaylon Tysonhad 16 points and 10 rebounds.
blurbs: ⬆️ Nae'Qwan Tomlin (CLE) played 26 min (season avg: 16). 6 pts, 8 reb, 1 ast.
📋 Jaylin Williams (OKC) made just his 4th start this season. 6 pts, 3 reb.

games.summary: WASHINGTON -- —James Hardenscored 36 points, and when he finally missed a couple big free throws in the final seconds, the ball came right back to him as the Los Angeles Clippers edged theWashington Wizards110-106 on Monday for their sixth straight victory. Alex Sarrled the Wizards with 28 points.
blurbs: ⬆️ Jordan Miller (LAC) played 28 min (season avg: 17). 16 pts, 5 reb, 3 ast.

games.summary: NEW YORK -- —Max Christiescored a season-high 26 points,Cooper Flagghad 18 in his first pro game at Madison Square Garden and theDallas Mavericksrolled to a 114-97 victory Monday over theNew York Knicks, who were booed frequently in the first half while falling behind by 30. 1 pick also had seven rebounds, whileNaji Marshallscored 18 points.
blurbs: 📋 Dwight Powell (DAL) made just his 5th start this season. 2 pts, 5 reb.
📋 Caleb Martin (DAL) made just his 3rd start this season. 3 pts, 1 reb.

games.summary: SAN ANTONIO -- —Victor Wembanyamahad a season-high seven 3-pointers and finished with 33 points and 10 rebounds hours after being named an All-Star starter for the first time as theSan Antonio Spursbeat theUtah Jazz123-110 on Monday. games.summary: PHILADELPHIA -- —Tyrese Maxeyhad 29 points and eight steals hours after being named anAll-Star starterfor the first time andJoel Embiidhad 30 points and nine rebounds to lead thePhiladelphia 76ersto a 113-104 win over theIndiana Pacerson Monday night. scored 18 points, and all five starters hit double figures.

games.summary: NEW YORK -- —Dillon Brooksscored 27 points,Devin Bookerhad 23 and thePhoenix Sunsbeat theBrooklyn Nets126-117 on Monday night. The Suns led by as many as 20 points in the first half and had a 17-point lead with 9:08 in the fourth quarter before the Nets charged back.
blurbs: 📋 Drake Powell (BKN) made just his 5th start this season. 11 pts, 1 reb.

games.summary: DETROIT -- —Tobias Harrisscored 25 points andJaylen Brownmissed a jumper just before the buzzer, allowing theDetroit Pistonsto hold on for a 104-103 win over theBoston Celticson Monday night in a matchup of teams with the best records in the Eastern Conference.
